about.title: About Us
about.introText: Concrete Surgeons (CS) is the Middle East's leading specialist in safety demolition, concrete cutting, and structural retrofitting. Since 2007, we've delivered precision solutions across Egypt and the Gulf, evolving into a trusted name in complex structural modification. Backed by over 20 years of experience, we support some of the region's most challenging redevelopment and infrastructure projects.
about.reason2: Pioneers in high-reach and controlled demolition
about.commitmentText: Every CS project is executed with surgical precision — safe, clean, and technically sound — driven by expert teams and cutting-edge equipment. Our reputation is built on trust, performance, and a relentless drive for engineering excellence.

demolition.title: Demolition Services
demolition.subtitle: Safe. Controlled. Engineered for precision.
demolition.safetyDesc: We offer safety-first demolition tailored to each site. Whether full-scale dismantling or selective interior strip-outs, our methods prioritize structural control and minimal disruption in live environments.
safetyList: Real-time monitoring and full code compliance
demolition.toolsDesc: Our specialized machinery enables top-down dismantling in the tightest environments — hospitals, towers, urban zones and more.
toolsExtra: Zero-vibration dismantling for hospitals and sensitive areas
Remote-operated arms ensure worker safety at heights
demolition.toolsNote: Minimal disruption in dense urban and live infrastructure zones.
whyList: 20+ years of experience in safety demolition
Trusted by major projects across the Middle East
demolition.highReachSubtitle: A cutting-edge vertical demolition method using long-reach excavators with precision tools. Designed for safe dismantling of tall or structurally sensitive buildings.
whatIsList: Uses boom arms from 20 to 70 meters for vertical access and control.
Demolishes from top to bottom, minimizing risk of uncontrolled collapse.
Ideal for towers, silos, and structures above 20 meters.
demolition.attachmentsDesc: Our specialized demolition tools are designed for maximum efficiency and safety across all site conditions:
attachmentsList: Concrete Pulverizers – crush debris into manageable fragments.
Steel Shears – slice through rebar and heavy structural steel effortlessly.
Concrete Crushers – break reinforced concrete silently and cleanly.
demolition.pioneeringDesc: Concrete Surgeons is proud to be the first in the Gulf to deploy a 27-meter high-reach demolition system. This breakthrough enables safe dismantling of tall, complex structures within active or congested areas— redefining controlled demolition across the region.
demolition.urbanDesc: Our demolition processes are tailored for urban density — minimizing disruption and maintaining structural control with high-efficiency tools and trained teams.
demolition.machineryDesc: From slabs to silos, every structure requires a specific strategy. Our advanced equipment is adapted on-site for each scenario, ensuring safe and efficient execution.
demolition.monitoringDesc: Every phase is tracked and optimized using sensors and site intelligence tools — reducing risk, maintaining compliance, and guaranteeing project integrity.
demolition.closingText: Combining cutting-edge equipment with technical mastery, Concrete Surgeons sets the benchmark for high-reach demolition — redefining safety, precision, and performance across the Middle East.
demolition.controlledDesc: Engineered solutions that preserve safety, stability, and efficiency — tailored to every building type.
controlledList: In-house services designed to maintain building safety during demolition.
Offers custom solutions based on time, quality, and cost.
demolition.diamondDesc: The cleanest, most precise way to cut reinforced concrete and structural steel — vibration-free and silent.
diamondList: High-accuracy cutting for both steel and reinforced concrete.
Suitable for precise structural cuts with minimal impact.
Ideal for sections with complex reinforcement.
demolition.roboticDesc: Precision demolition using compact robots — powerful, quiet, and safe for interior structural removal.
roboticList: High crushing power with minimal weight.
Safe for interior demolition of load-bearing walls and slabs.
360° rotation, interchangeable heads, and minimal noise.
Efficient for sensitive building environments and tight spaces.

retrofit.title: Structural Retrofitting & Reinforcement
retrofit.subtitle: Advanced structural strengthening techniques tailored for durability, capacity, and safety.

services.title: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP)
services.desc:
• Lightweight carbon fiber sheets used for flexural or shear strengthening.
• Provides up to 5x the tensile strength of steel.
• Applied to beams, slabs, and columns to increase structural capacity.
• Non-corrosive and ideal for aggressive environments.

services.title: Steel Section Strengthening
services.desc:
• Enhances structural integrity using steel plates, angles, or beams.
• Used where load capacity needs to be upgraded without full replacement.
• Techniques include welding/bolting sections and epoxy/grout composite action.

services.title: Concrete Section Enlargement (Jacketing)
services.desc:
• Enlarges columns, beams, or walls to boost load-bearing capacity.
• Uses steel reinforcement and bonding agents before applying new concrete.
• Common in retrofitting projects or when design loads increase.

services.title: Shotcrete Application
services.desc:
• Pneumatically applied concrete sprayed at high velocity.
• Forms a dense, durable protective layer over reinforcement.
• Ideal for surface repair, slope stabilization, and irregular surface strengthening.

services.title: Cracks & Cavities Repair
services.desc:
• Epoxy injection for structural cracks restores integrity and load transfer.
• Polyurethane seals non-structural cracks to prevent water ingress.
• Voids are filled using cementitious grout or injection-based methods.

services.title: Rebar Anchoring Installation
services.desc:
• Advanced anchoring system compatible with various bar sizes and depths.
• High-strength chemical adhesive ensures secure bond to concrete.
• Ideal for structural connections and retrofit applications.
• Rebar anchoring installation using adhesives

services.title: Pull-Out Test Services
services.desc:
• Verifies the actual anchorage strength of installed rebars or bolts.
• Conducted using hydraulic jacks and calibrated gauges.
• Ensures structural safety, quality control, and compliance.

cutting.title: Concrete Cutting & Structural Modification
cutting.subtitle: Precision cutting and modification for structural integrity and advanced engineering solutions.

services.title: Structural Modifications for Changing Building Use
services.desc: Includes comprehensive construction interventions such as reinforcement, redistribution, demolition, and excavation to adapt structures for new usage purposes. Suitable for space expansion, reshaping, or full structural reconfiguration in compliance with safety standards.

services.title: Restoration of Old Buildings
services.desc: Restoration of deteriorated buildings by removing damaged concrete and corroded steel, replacing it with new reinforcement, applying anti-corrosion coatings, and recasting using specialized high-strength repair materials.

services.title: Crack & Cavity Repair
services.desc: Cracks are treated using epoxy or resin injection techniques based on crack width and structure condition. Cavities are detected using non-destructive testing methods and filled with epoxy grout or high-strength concrete to restore structural integrity.

services.title: Concrete Section Enlargement
services.desc: Enlargement of structural elements such as columns, beams, and slabs by extending reinforcement, applying bonding agents, and casting new reinforced concrete.

services.title: Shotcrete Application
services.desc: Shotcrete is applied under high pressure to cover surfaces, fill voids, and repair damaged areas. Offers strong adhesion, low permeability, and long-lasting reinforcement.

services.title: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP) Strengthening
services.desc: CFRP sheets and laminates strengthen concrete components with high tensile resistance. Lightweight and flexible, ideal for slabs, beams, and columns.

services.title: Strengthening by Steel Plates and Angles
services.desc: Steel plates and angles reinforce concrete sections, increasing rigidity and durability, especially in retrofitting and repair projects.

services.title: Anchor Bolt Supply & Installation
services.desc: High-performance anchor bolts secure equipment and structural elements, offering excellent pull-out resistance and long-term stability.

services.title: Steel Rebar Anchoring in Concrete
services.desc: Advanced rebar anchoring systems embed steel into existing concrete using drilling, cleaning, and bonding for new reinforcement.

services.title: Concrete Demolition
services.desc: Manual demolition uses hammers and chisels for precise removal. Mechanical demolition uses electric jackhammers for heavy or deep demolition.

services.title: Concrete Drilling
services.desc: Diamond Core Drilling allows holes up to 1 meter, ideal for pass-throughs and testing. Hammer drilling is used for smaller anchor holes and conduit routing.

services.title: Concrete Cutting Services
services.desc: Blade Saw Cutting handles walls/floors up to 50 cm thick. Diamond Wire Saw Cutting cuts reinforced concrete of any thickness or shape.

cutting.projectDesc: Our concrete cutting expertise was utilized at Damietta Port for large-scale structural modifications, precision cutting of reinforced concrete, and high-strength anchoring — ensuring safe operations within an active marine environment.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies | Concrete Surgeons
caseStudies.heroSubtitle: Discover how we've delivered exceptional results across Egypt and the Gulf region.

case1.title: Pioneering High-Reach Demolition at GSK Pharmaceutical – El Salam City
case1.overview: At the GSK pharmaceutical facility in El Salam City, our team successfully completed the controlled demolition of two industrial buildings using a technique that had never before been introduced in Egypt or the Gulf region.
case1.challenge: The demolition took place in a highly sensitive pharmaceutical site where operations were ongoing. Key challenges included:
challenges: Working in close proximity to critical infrastructure
Ensuring non-disruptive execution in a live industrial environment
Maintaining exceptional safety and environmental standards
case1.solution: For the first time in the region, we deployed a High-Reach Demolition Excavator with the following capabilities:
capabilities: Multiple attachments: Including hydraulic breakers and concrete crushers
Enhanced safety: Stability monitoring, controlled debris management, and reduced dust and noise emissions
results: Zero incidents recorded throughout the operation
Introduced a new standard of controlled demolition in industrial zones
First-ever use of 27m high-reach technology in Egypt and the Gulf

case2.title: One of the World's Largest Concrete Cutting Projects – Damietta Port Quay
case2.overview: In partnership with PETROJET, our team successfully executed one of the largest concrete cutting operations in the world, involving the cutting of the quay structure at Damietta Port using advanced diamond wire saw technology. This landmark project reinforced our reputation as a regional leader in specialized concrete cutting and structural modification.
case2.technology: This project utilized state-of-the-art diamond wire saw technology, enabling precise cutting of massive concrete structures while maintaining structural integrity and operational safety within an active marine environment.
scope: Large-scale structural modifications at an active port facility
Precision cutting of reinforced concrete quay structures
Maintenance of port operations throughout the project
case2.achievement: This landmark project established new benchmarks for concrete cutting operations in marine environments, demonstrating our capability to handle complex structural modifications while maintaining operational continuity in critical infrastructure.
case2.videoCaption: Watch the Damietta Port concrete cutting project in action
